message:
2019-01-03

=====Material URLs=====

Video: https://edition.cnn.com/2018/12/09/cnn10/ten-content-mon/index.html

Transcript: http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/1812/10/sn.01.html

오늘은, CNN Hero에 선발된 학생에 대한 에피소드가 나옵니다. 어린 나이임에도 불구하고, 세상을 보다 좋게 만들려는 시도가 아름답고 대핟하다고 생각 합니다.

Today, there's an episode about a student selected by CNN Hero. Even at a young age, I think the attempt to make the world better is beautiful and great.

====Video Contents====

00:00 - 02:45
A report on continued unrest in France, as the nation's president prepares to address his country.

02:45 - 04:30
Explanations of a SpaceX success and a SpaceX failure follow.

04:30 - 08:40
A Young Wonder who's helping kids on another continent get what they need to play ball.
